description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is not more than 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the sixteenth course of Master the Fundamentals of Bernina Embroidery Software 7.

To digitizing a design or logo or what it is you require, you need good artwork, or if it is something you choose to do freehand you also will be able to do so.

With Artwork needed, there are certain points you have to have in place before you can continue and finish a design.

The correct tool to draw or build your design is vital. For this class we focus on the Closed Curve tool.

The options you have with this tool, and how to manage it.

Manage your fill stitches will be part of this class, and you will start to understand the importance of the rules of fill stitches, angels and all.

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 20 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software.
title: #16/17: Bernina Software 7: The Fundamentals of Close Curve
